transition_risks.title: KT Sessions Getting Rescheduled Due to SME Bandwidth
transition_risks.impact: Delays Wave-1 KT completion and affects shadow readiness.
transition_risks.root_cause: Onshore SMEs managing BAU + transition load without backup.
recommended_mitigation: Introduce secondary SMEs for load balancing.
Define strict KT acceptance criteria and freeze session calendar.
Move low-complexity KT topics to recorded walkthroughs.

transition_risks.title: Environment Access Delays
transition_risks.impact: Hands-on KT blocked; shadow phase may slip by 5–7 days.
transition_risks.root_cause: Firewall rule approvals pending; ticket delays.
early_indicators: No single owner for access approvals
recommended_mitigation: Escalate to environment leadership.
Add approver mapping to the KT readiness tracker.
Enable temporary controlled access for walkthroughs.

transition_risks.title: Inconsistent Documentation Quality
transition_risks.impact: High rework during transition; shadow handover becomes error-prone.
transition_risks.root_cause: Documentation shared over email, not standardized.
early_indicators: Multiple outdated versions of same document
recommended_mitigation: Centralize documentation in Confluence.
Introduce mandatory SME approval workflow.
Add visual diagrams for functional flows.

transition_risks.title: Dependency Mapping Not Fully Captured
transition_risks.impact: E2E testing readiness unclear; transition planning may require re-baselining.
recommended_mitigation: Run an accelerated dependency workshop with customer architects.
Track each dependency owner in the RAID log.
Update KT plan with dependency-specific sessions.

transition_risks.title: Shadow Support Team Not Ready
transition_risks.impact: Extended hypercare, customer dissatisfaction, increased transition costs.
transition_risks.root_cause: KT depth varies; lack of hands-on access.
early_indicators: Low confidence scores in KT feedback
Team unable to replicate SME walkthrough steps
recommended_mitigation: Conduct targeted deep-dive refreshers.
Validate readiness via scenario-based mock runs.
Run proto-shadow exercises before go-live.

operational_risks.title: CR Queue Backlog Delaying Environment Updates
operational_risks.impact: Build deployments delayed by 2–3 days per cycle.
recommended_mitigation: Prioritize transition-related CRQs.
Create a fast-track SLA for transition tickets.

operational_risks.title: Monitoring Gaps in Batch Jobs
operational_risks.impact: High probability of missing critical failures during hypercare.
operational_risks.root_cause: Monitoring console access not fully provisioned.
recommended_mitigation: Enable limited access for shadow team.
Document monitoring flow and exception patterns.

compliance_risks.title: PII Data Handling Not Formalized in KT
compliance_risks.impact: Potential compliance breach during shadow support.
compliance_risks.root_cause: Lack of dedicated KT on data-handling guidelines.
recommended_mitigation: Include GDPR-compliant handling guidelines in KT pack.
Conduct a dedicated session with InfoSec SME.
